resources.string: Coronavirus in India live updates: Kerala records 20,240 fresh Covid cases, 67 deaths

A person must take two doses of the anti-Covid vaccine, Covaxin, even after recovering from Covid-19, for being considered as a fully vaccinated individual, a Union health ministry official said. Stay
The COVID-19 virus affects different people in different ways.
